ofcprobe.vswitch.trafficgen

Class PayLoadGen

  • java.lang.Object
    • ofcprobe.vswitch.trafficgen.PayLoadGen

  • public class PayLoadGen
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class generates Payload. atm only random TCP Syns supported
    Author:
    Christopher Metter(christopher.metter@informatik.uni-wuerzburg.de)
